pageTitle: Pittsburgh Celebrates The Irish Experience « CBS Pittsburgh
TableContextTimeStampBeforeTable: {14355=September 5, 2011 5:55 AM, 11799=Riverplex (between Sandcastle and the Waterfront) 1000 Sandcastle Drive, Pittsburgh, PA 15120 Friday, September 9th from 4pm-midnight Saturday, September 10th from 11am-midnight Sunday, September 11th from 9am-6pm (412) 422-1113 Website: www.pghirishfest.org, 10553=Children can enjoy special performances and activities, including sing-a-longs and storytelling. One of our favorite attractions is the Irish Dog tent, where you can encounter the regal (and gigantic) Irish Wolfhound. A special Gaelic Mass will also be held on Sunday, September 11th at 10am.}
